languages.text: {n}В глазах сержанта плещется ужас.{/n} "Виноват, Ваш высокобродие! Сию минуту исправимся! За мной, братцы! Две минуты на перезарядку и штопку ран, и погоним прочь мятежную мразь!" {n}Сержант зычно кричит, призывая бойцов в явно самоубийственную атаку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах сержанта вы видите ужас.{/n} "Пощадите, Ваш высокобродие! Сию минуту исправимся! За мной, братцы, погоним прочь мятежную мразь!" {n}Сержант зычно вопит, призывая бойцов в явно самоубийственную атаку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах сержанта плещется ужас.{/n} "Виноват, Ваш высокобродие! Сию минуту исправимся! За мной, братцы! Две минуты на перезарядку и штопку ран, и погоним прочь мятежную мразь!" {n}Сержант зычно кричит, призывая бойцов в явно самоубийственную атаку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we'll rout the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for an unmistakeably suicidal offensive.{/n}

{n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We'll rectify that at once! Follow my lead, brothers, let's rout the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, ordering his troops to go on an unmistakeably suicidal offensive.{/n}

I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for an unmistakably suicidal offensive.{/n}

I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for an unmistakably suicidal offensive.{/n}

I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

{n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entsetzen steigt in die Augen des Sergeants.{/n} "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Wir werden das augenblicklich korrigieren! Bereitmachen, Leute! Ich gebe Euch zwei Minuten, um nachzuladen und Euch zu verarzten, dann verjagen wir das Rebellenpack!" {n}Mit gebrüllten Kommandos rüstet er seine Truppen für eine Offensive, von der jeder weiß, sie ist Selbstmord.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entsetzen steigt in die Augen des Sergeants.{/n} "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Wir werden das augenblicklich korrigieren! Bereitmachen, Leute! Ich gebe Euch zwei Minuten, um nachzuladen und Euch zu verarzten, dann verjagen wir das Rebellenpack!" {n}Mit gebrüllten Kommandos rüstet er seine Truppen für eine Offensive, von der jeder weiß, sie ist Selbstmord.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sergent affiche un regard horrifié.{/n} « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! On va rectifier le tir sur-le-champ ! À ma botte, vous autres ! Je vous donne deux minutes pour recharger et vous rafistoler, ensuite on fonce faire leur fête à ces fumiers de rebelles ! » {n}Il éructe des ordres et organise ses troupes pour une offensive qui ne peut qu'être suicidaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent affiche un regard horrifié.{/n} « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! On va rectifier le tir sur le champ ! À ma botte, vous autres ! Je vous donne deux minutes pour recharger et vous rafistoler, ensuite on fonce faire leur fête à ces fumiers de rebelles ! » {n}Il éructe des ordres et organise ses troupes pour une offensive qui ne peut qu'être suicidaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}军士眼中充满了恐惧。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人！我们马上改正！所有人都听好了！我给你们两分钟时间装好子弹，把伤口都包扎好，之后咱们就去消灭那群叛军渣滓！”{n}他嘶吼着下达命令，组织起他的部队，准备发起一次彻头彻尾的自杀式进攻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}军士眼中充满了恐惧。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人！我们马上改正！所有人都听好了！我给你们两分钟时间装好子弹，把伤口都包扎好，之后咱们就去消灭那群叛军渣滓！”{n}他嘶吼着下达命令，组织起他的部队，准备发起一次彻头彻尾的自杀式进攻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}軍曹の目に恐怖が広がる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！すぐに改めます！聞け、お前ら！装填と手当てに2分やるから、反乱軍の残党を一掃しろ！」{n}軍曹は大声で命令を出して、間違いなく自殺行為となる攻撃へと部隊を突き動かした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹の目に恐怖が広がる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！すぐに改めます！俺の指示に従うんだ！装填と手当てに2分やるから、反乱軍の残党を一掃しろ！」{n}軍曹は大声で命令を出して、明らかな自殺行為へと部隊を突き動かした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El horror llena los ojos del sargento.{/n} «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Lo arreglaremos de inmediato! ¡Seguidme! Os doy dos minutos para recargar y arreglaros, ¡después iremos a por la escoria rebelde!». {n}Ruge sus órdenes, organizando sus tropas para una ofensiva indudablemente suicida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Horror fills the sergeant's eyes.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We will rectify that at once! Follow my lead, you lot! I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El horror llena los ojos del sargento.{/n} «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Lo arreglaremos de inmediato! ¡Seguidme! Os doy dos minutos para recargar y arreglaros, ¡después iremos a por la escoria rebelde!». {n}Ruge sus órdenes, organizando sus tropas para una ofensiva claramente suicida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çavuşun gözleri dehşetle doluyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Hatamı bir an önce düzelteceğim! Beni takip edin millet! Toparlanmak için iki dakikanız var, isyancı müsveddelerinin boğazına çökeceğiz!" {n}Kükreyip emirler yağdırarak askerlerini intihar olduğu her hâlinden belli olan saldırıya hazırlıyor.{/n}

I'm giving you two minutes to reload and patch yourselves up, then we are routing the rebel dregs!" {n}He roars his commands, organising his troops for what is undoubtedly a suicidal offensive.{/n}
